scripts.build: pnpm install && pnpm build:common && pnpm build:telemetry-server && pnpm build:cli
scripts.build:common: cd common && pnpm build && cd .. && pnpm export:schemas
scripts.pack:all: pnpm run pack:cli && pnpm run pack:telemetry-server && pnpm run pack:common && pnpm run package:binaries
scripts.package:binaries: pnpm run build && echo "Building for macOS (Apple Silicon, arm64)..." && bun build cli/src/bin/genkit.ts --compile --outfile dist/genkit-bun-macos-arm64 --target bun-darwin-arm64 && echo "Building for macOS (Intel, x64)..." && bun build cli/src/bin/genkit.ts --compile --outfile dist/genkit-bun-macos-x64 --target bun-darwin-x64 && echo "Building for Linux (x64)..." && bun build cli/src/bin/genkit.ts --compile --outfile dist/genkit-bun-linux-x64 --target bun-linux-x64 && echo "Building for Windows (x64)..." && bun build cli/src/bin/genkit.ts --compile --outfile dist/genkit-bun-windows-x64.exe --target bun-windows-x64 && echo "Binary packaging complete."
